Power Button
Unlock door button
Patient line port
Outlet air sensor light
On fluid loading area
Door Open
Impossible to open door when patient line inserted
Prime container (injector will not work without this in place)
Day Set & Patient Line
24h day set
Spikes
Air sensor Tube
Orange Dat Set Cap
Closed-loop connection
Installing Day Set
Do not move orange cap
Piston Advance
Oush air sensor tube into outlet air sensor
Open snap spike adaptors into holders
Replacing Spike
Spikes labelled 24h
Replace is not sterile
Load Contrast & Saline
Select on display
Slide Bottle onto Holder
Fill
Repeat for addition bottles
Select Blue Icon for saline
Spike bag horizontally
Replacing Fluids
Remove empty container
Select correspoding icon
Load on spike and press fill
Chaning contrast concentrations
Performing injection
Arm button
Checking for air
Test injection
Ending exam
Managing air detection
Inecjtor automatically stops if air detected
Disconnect patient and follow on screen instruction
Advance saline to clear air
